amendment.description: Amendment sought to limit contributions to the affordable housing fund when the government has an actual on-budget deficit and an actual off-budget surplus.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 27 printed in the Congressional Record to add a new paragraph limiting contributions to affordable housing fund when the government has an on-budget and an off-budget surplus.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Roskam amendment (A009) Failed by recorded vote: 173 - 245 (Roll no. 382).
